alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Grady; McClain; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Grady, southern Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland, southeastern Canadian and northwestern McClain Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms from near Chickasha to Moore, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, northwestern Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Mustang, Choctaw, Tuttle, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Nicoma Park, Goldsby, Valley Brook, Amber, Bridge Creek, Stanley Draper Lake and Tabler. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 107 and 136. Interstate 40 between mile markers 145 and 172. Interstate 44 between mile markers 79 and 122, and between mile markers 125 and 130. Interstate 240 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
